ygData.subject: Pets get buffed???
ygData.msgSnippet: Did anyone 49+ notice if our pets were changed lately? Im 52 now, and have been getting tons of green pets lately (since next pet is 53). 2 out of the 3
ygData.messageBody:
Did anyone 49+ notice if our pets were changed lately? Im 52 now, and have
been getting tons of green pets lately (since next pet is 53). 2 out of the
3 possible levels for the pets were green (last week). Anyways, this week
i've yet to get a green one. I summoned 2 pets, both blue, i figured cool
its blue its must be my big one. But my buddy is lev 54, meaning everything
i summon should be green to him (as they were last week), decided to /con
them, the first one was blue to him as well, and the second one was green to
him (blue to me). This got us really stumped (and happy too)

Could it be that:
1. They beefed up our pets in levels?
2. They changed the /con table?

Anyone else notice anything?

-Rakka
Sol Ro
